mapper.select:
select scq.*,pds.ridgeType,pds.`name` from supplier_cardboard_quotation scq left join paperboard_data_setting pds on scq.pager_Id = pds.id where scq.is_deleted =0
and scq.code like concat('%', #{code} , '%')
and scq.abbreviation like concat('%', #{abbreviation} , '%')
and scq.created_time like concat('%', #{time} , '%')
